# Sign up for our newsletter! Stay informed on the latest DevOps news

Five Great DevOps Job Opportunities

DevOps.com is now providing a weekly DevOps jobs report through which opportunities for DevOps professionals will be highlighted as part of an effort to better serve our audience.

Our goal in these challenging economic times is to make it just that much easier for DevOps professionals to advance their careers.

Of course, the pool of available DevOps talent is still relatively constrained, so when one DevOps professional takes on a new role, it tends to create opportunities for others.

The five job postings shared this week are selected based on the company looking to hire, the vertical industry segment and naturally, the pay scale being offered.

We’re also committed to providing [additional insights](https://devops.com/redefining-engineering-excellence-how-product-skills-amplify-your-impact-in-the-era-of-ai/) into the state of the DevOps job market. In the meantime, for your consideration.

**SimplyHired.com**

[![Techstrong Gang Youtube](https://securityboulevard.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Techstrong-Gang-Youtube-PodcastV2-770.png)](https://youtu.be/Fojn5NFwaw8)

[![Techstrong Gang Youtube](https://devops.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/770X330-DevOps-AppDev-Mar2025D.jpg)](https://info.futurumgroup.com/devops_appdev?utm_source=referral&utm_medium=in-article&utm_campaign=DevOps-Application-Report)

[![Techstrong Gang Youtube](https://devops.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/770X330-DevOps-AppDev-Mar2025-2D.jpg)](https://info.futurumgroup.com/devops_appdev?utm_source=referral&utm_medium=in-article&utm_campaign=DevOps-Application-Report)

FloQast San Jose, CA [DevOps Staff Engineer](https://www.simplyhired.com/search?q=DevOps&jt=CF3CP&t=7&job=iBEOczU-HErHtmlN3ZjlrfXrLXhd95KDiJImFLmxIzhie-7h9aM_XQ) $164,000 to $246,000

**Dice.com**

NMI Remote [Staff DevOps Infrastructure Engineer](https://www.dice.com/job-detail/75059749-f9d5-4b19-99b3-d7102034a743) $155,000 to $165,000

**LinkedIn**

**Indeed.com**

Coinstar Remote [Cloud Engineer II](https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=DevOps&l=&fromage=7&sc=0kf%3Aattr%28CF3CP%29%3B&from=searchOnDesktopSerp&vjk=437c49dfd681867b) $113,892 to $170,837

**The Job Network**

Grey Matters Defense Solutions Boulder, CO [DevOps Engineer](https://www.thejobnetwork.com/jobs?search=grey+matter+defense+&jobId=2147483647) $105,000 to $170,000

![job, opportunities, devops, career, jobs](https://devops.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/dream-job-2904780_1280-1-150x150.jpg)DevOps.com continues to provide a weekly jobs report to highlight career opportunities for DevOps professionals and opportunities highlighted this week include roles at NMI, HiBob and FloQast.
Title: Five Great DevOps Job Opportunities
